title: Entrepreneurship and innovation in Nigerian universities: Trends, challenges and opportunities
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Muyiwa Oyinlola, Oluwaseun Kolade, Silifat Abimbola Okoya, Olubunmi Ajala, Arinola Adefila, Adedapo Adediji, Kunle Babaremu, Bosun Tijani, Jude Adejuwon, Faith Wambui, Esther Titilayo Akinlabi
